sentence.text: She smiled and gestured that she could n't hear him .
Gesturing that she was to follow him , he began to march along the path that led down the hill , and was quickly out of sight .
The second one shook his head and gestured we should follow .
Thomas stopped and gestured Corbett to do the same .
He clutched his ear , then gestured them to lean against the side walls .
Orcadai gestured them to silence and paced the length of the room .
He is sitting behind his large desk and does not gesture you to sit .
Edward gestured de Warenne forward .
I went back to my desk , picked the folder.up , and gestured her to a chair .
Talbot led them to the wardroom and gestured them to their seats .
He gestured her towards the velvet armchair opposite him .
Omally peered furtively about the bar and gestured the barman closer .
Gesturing his captains aside he grasped the Halfling by the shoulder and gently shook him .
He took the seat to which Carson had gestured him and glanced at the message slip .
The porter gestured him over .
He gestured me in .
He gestured for her to take a seat .
He gestured for her to move aside so he could take a closer look at the microphone .
The sergeant considered , shrugged and gestured for the old man 's papers .
But now it was Alan who was gesturing for silence .
Rufus gestures for silence like a compère killing applause .
The policeman kicked it away and gestured for Whitlock to approach the police car .
Sheldukher gestured to Postine to comply .
` I guess not , " Sabrina replied then gestured towards the bodies .
He gestured towards the notes Lindsey had taken from the envelope .
Blanche gestured with her right hand , inviting him to continue .
